message: you are looking for information in cambridge
you are looking for a place to dine. the restaurant should serve indian food and should be in the expensive price range
the restaurant should be in the centre
once you find the restaurant you want to book a table for 6 people at 19:30 on saturday
make sure you get the reference number
you are also looking for a hotel. the hotel should have a star of 3 and doesn't need to include internet
the hotel should be in the type of guesthouse
once you find the hotel you want to book it for the same group of people and 2 nights starting from the same day
if the booking fails how about 1 nights
make sure you get the reference number

log.text: i'd really like to take my client out to a nice restaurant that serves indian food.
i show many restaurants that serve indian food in that price range. what area would you like to travel to?
i am looking for an expensive indian restaurant in the area of centre.
i am not certain which restaurant you're asking , would you mind being more specific about it , saffron brasserie , curry queen , pizza hut cherry hinton or the nirala ?
let's see , i'd like to know about the saffron brasserie . <conj> sure thing, please book for 6 people at 19:30 on saturday.
booking was successful. the table will be reserved for 15 minutes. your reference number is : rf00jufq .
okay great! thank you so much. could you also help me find a 3 star hotel in the area. i don't need wifi either.
the alpha-milton guest house is in the north and is moderately priced. it has 3 stars and no internet or parking. would you like to book a room?
that sounds great. please book that now.
may i ask how many people are in your group?
i have 6 people in my group.
how many days would you like to stay?
2 nights, starting the same day as the reservation.
i'm sorry. it looks like they're full. would you like me to look for something else?
yes please. is there something else available in that area?
i'm sorry, it looks like that is the only 3 star hotel in that area, would you like me to look somewhere else?
can we try for 1 night instead of 2? i'll need the reference number please.
i was able to get one night, the reference number is 9xvt8m5t .
thank you so much!
i'm glad to help, you're welcome!

message: you are traveling to cambridge and looking forward to try local restaurants
you are looking for a restaurant. the restaurant should be in the expensive price range and should serve seafood food
once you find the restaurant you want to book a table for 8 people at 19:45 on friday
make sure you get the reference number
you are also looking for a place to stay. the hotel should have a star of 3 and doesn't need to include internet
the hotel should be in the west
if there is no such hotel, how about one that has free wifi
make sure you get whether they have free parking, address, and phone number
you also want to book a taxi to commute between the two places
you want to make sure it arrives the restaurant by the booked time
make sure you get contact number and car type

log.text: is there any expensive seafood restaurant in town?
yes, there is an upscale seafood restaurant called loch fyne which is centrally located. would you like me to make a reservation for you?
can i get a booking for 8 people at 19:45 on friday? send me the reference number.
booking was successful. the table will be reserved for 15 minutes. your reference number is : j5q03qcs . is there anything else i can help you with today?
yes, i also need a place to stay a 3 star preference and it does not have to have the internet, thanks for your help.
we have just the place. the alpha-milton guest house is a 3 star place that is located in the north. will that be okay?
no i need a hotel in the west. can you search again please?
unfortunately there are no 3-star hotels in the west area.
are there any hotels that fit that description with free wifi without three stars?
we have just the place. the huntington marriott hotel is a 4 star place with wifi that is located in the west. will that be okay?
sure as long as they have free parking as well. can you give me the address and phone number please?
there is free parking. the phone number is 01480446000, and the address is kingfisher way, hinchinbrook. will that be all for today?
i also need a taxi booked to commute the two places and need it to get to the restaurant by 19:45
sure thing! i've booked a yellow tesla for you. if you need it, the contact number is 07855855225. is there anything else i can help with today?
i just want to make sure it'll arrive in time for the restaurant reservation at 19:45. can i get a contact number and type of car the taxi would be?
the car is a yellow tesla. the contact number is 07855855225.
thank you very much for all of your help today.
you are welcome very much. thank you for using our service.

log.text: i'm looking for hotels in the center.

i don't have a preference.
the university arms hotel fits all of your criteria, would you like me to book a room?
yes, please book a room for 3 people and 5 nights.
what day would you like to start your reservation?
please start the reservation on monday. what is the reference number? i also need a restaurant that serves australasian food at a moderate price in the same area as the hotel

certainly, we have either restaurant one seven, the oak bistro, the copper kettle, cotto. can i book a table at one, if so how many will be dining?
three people please, on monday at 18:30.
booked you a table at the oak bistro. your reference number is ssutw528 .
thank you very much for your help.
you are welcome.
